newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Budapest BSE suspends Skala for rest of day.
newsitem.headline: Budapest BSE suspends Skala for rest of day.

text.p: The Budapest Stock Exchange suspended trading in holding company Skala-Coop shares for the rest of the day after a too rapid intraday rise, traders told Reuters.
Skala shares opened at 2,100 forints, above Tuesday's close of 2,020 forints and surged more than 20 percent to 2,440 forints, triggering its suspension.
The last deal was concluded at 1132 GMT.
